description: Ignite the Web: Unravel the Web Mysteries! Mozilla Firefox Club brings the Enigmatic Firefox Expedition! Our Event Firefox Expedition is an Exhilarating Journey through Cryptic Riddles and Tangled Codes. Remember, curiosity is your compass. The more curious you are, the closer you get to the solution. Letâ€™s dive into the exciting world of Mozilla Firefox and celebrate the art of problem-solving!

TechZILLA'23 is a two-day event with both technical and social components. It will include a variety of activities such as discussion sessions, interviews, question and answer panels, and demonstrations by student speakers, professionals, faculty, and other notable speakers.

This is just for explanation purpose how these events got added here because in the Event.json file there is a object for each event and if you add other objects in that json file present in the src folder and then commit those changes you can see that those automatically get reflected on the site.
